about_the_game:
This is a horror game. Players can experience the thrilling haunted house tour with a helmet. You need to find the key to open the door of the room and open the last exit door after opening 5 doors. In this game, you need not only enough guts but also keen observation ability, but also the ability to customize the face of the female ghost npc to experience a different kind of fun.

Operation mode:
W: forward
S: backward
A: Left
D: Right
F: Unlock the mouse and lock the mouse,
ESC: pop-up menu,
Click the mouse to open the door, the goal of the game, find the key in the scary haunted house environment, open the secret hidden behind the door...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 3000 or above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: Celeron 1.5(1.5G) or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX450,AMD HD7870,512 MB VRAM or above
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: This is a horror game. Players can experience the thrilling haunted house tour with a helmet. In this game, not only enough courage is required but also keen observation ability is required. At the same time, the face of the female ghost npc can be customized to experience Different fun.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Arabic, Korean
